about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling odyssey through the remnants of a world torn apart by the audacious ambitions of scientists who dared to unravel the very essence of reality. In a post-apocalyptic realm where the boundary between technology and the supernatural has disintegrated. Take flight as the fearless pilot GHOST, accompanied by the enigmatic spirit known only as "The Phoenix," as you are thrust into a relentless battle against possessed war machines and otherworldly monstrosities. Beautifully executed pixel art immerses you in this exhilarating, fast-paced top-down shoot 'em up!

Key Features:

Epic Journey Across 4 Chapters and 20 Heart-Pounding Levels

    • Immerse yourself in a fast-paced adventure spanning four intense chapters and 20 uniquely challenging levels. Brace yourself for a non-stop barrage of excitement.

Navigate the Unknown in randomly generated wormholes

    • Test your mettle as a pilot by skillfully navigating unpredictable wormholes that twist the fabric of reality. Every journey is a new, adrenaline-pumping challenge.

Collect Souls and Wreck Havoc on Hordes of Enemies

    • Engage in fierce battles and obliterate waves of fierce adversaries to collect precious souls and valuable parts. The more chaos you unleash, the greater the rewards.

Unlock New Weapons with Collected Blueprints

    • Gather blueprints from the chaos of battle and exchange them for the keys to a formidable array of new weapons. Every blueprint acquired is a step toward enhancing your firepower, ensuring that each subsequent playthrough introduces a fresh and exciting arsenal. Your journey is not just about survival; it's about mastering the evolving technology of a fractured world.

Upgrade Your Arsenal with Unique Loot

    • Salvage rare and unique loot from fallen foes to upgrade your arsenal. Every piece of gear brings you one step closer to becoming an unstoppable force.

Eternal Cycle, Endless Possibilities

    • Embrace the ever-turning wheel of time, where the day and night cycle is not just a passage of hours but a crucible of choice. Will you dare to face the dangers of the night for the allure of greater rewards, or will you strategically navigate the daylight hours, ensuring a safer but potentially less lucrative journey?

Unlock Perks to Shape Your Destiny

    • Every soul absorbed is a step toward unlocking transformative perks that will shape your destiny in the fractured realms. Tailor your abilities, enhance your strengths, and evolve your playstyle with each absorbed soul. As you progress, the synergy between pilot and spirit becomes the catalyst for unparalleled feats.

Phoenix Perks


    Forge Your Destiny with Three Vital Attributes: Durability, Evasion, and Power

      • Embark on a soul-fueled odyssey where your choices define the essence of your pilot, GHOST, and the ethereal companion, The Phoenix. As you absorb souls, channel their energy into three pivotal attributes - Durability, Evasion, and Power - each offering a distinct path to shape your destiny.

    Durability: Resilience Beyond Measure

      • Invest in Durability to fortify your craft against the relentless onslaught. As you level up this attribute, unlock perks that enhance your armor, providing greater survivability in the face of overwhelming odds. Become a formidable force, weathering the storm with unyielding strength.

    Evasion: Dance through Chaos with Grace

      • Choose the path of Evasion to master the art of nimble maneuvering. Unleash perks that grant heightened agility, allowing you to effortlessly dodge incoming projectiles. Navigate the chaos with finesse, turning every encounter into a mesmerizing dance where your movements are the key to survival.

    Power: Unleash Devastating Force

      • Embrace the allure of Power to amplify your offensive capabilities. As you ascend the Power tree, unlock perks that grant access to rarer weapons and enhance your firepower. Unleash devastating attacks upon your foes, turning the tide of battle with every shot and leaving destruction in your wake.

    Carry Your Attributes into the Next Playthrough

      • The choices you make in the realm of souls resonate through the dimensions. Carry the enhanced attributes of Durability, Evasion, and Power into subsequent playthroughs, forging a legacy that transcends time and space. Your pilot's evolution is not a singular event but an ongoing saga of empowerment.
    This dynamic perk tree transforms the journey into a strategic tapestry, allowing you to specialize in Durability for unyielding defense, Evasion for nimble escapades, or Power for overwhelming offense. Each attribute opens a unique path, ensuring that your playstyle is as distinctive as the fractured world you navigate. Absorb souls, shape your attributes, and become the architect of your own cosmic destiny. The post-apocalyptic realms await your mark.

name: The Ghost and The Phoenix
short_description: Peer beyond the veil and experience the ethereal in The Ghost and The Phoenix, a captivating neo-classical top-down shooter. Navigate the realms between life and death in this supernatural action-packed adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
